# iosxr_policy_global_set (Data Source)

This data source can read the Policy Global Set configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_policy_global_set" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `rpl` (String) Configures a policy global set
